resources.string: Please choose a valid server URL
You are not connected to f4f.
Do you really want to clear all %1$s?
You need to be online to sign in to f4f backend.
This is not a valid f4f backend or the server is not accessible.
This sign up QR code has expired. Please ask for a new one at study administration.
Your session has expired. Please sign up with your credentials.
Unexpected Error! Please contact study administration.
Cannot communicate with f4f server. Please try again another time or contact study administration. Thank you for your understanding.
The Garmin Fitness Tracker must be connected to the smartphone in regular periods of time to exchange the collected data.
Your f4f Study Companion is not yet connected to the f4f server.
Please log-in using your credentials or via QR Code by tapping the following button:
You are signed in holding the role:
Please browse the navigation on the left side of the screen to access your possible actions.
Welcome!\nYou are connected to the f4f service holding the role:\nstudy assistant
Press again to CLOSE food4future Study Companion App.
Received invalid data from server. Please contact study management.
Successfully deleted participant with username \'%1$s\' and all associated data sets.
Successfully deleted user with username \'%1$s\' and all associated data sets.
Error when trying to delete user. Please contact developer.
Are you sure to delete user\n\'%1$s\' ?
You cannot delete yourself. Please use another user profile.
"Error on initializing Garmin Health SDK. Reason: '%1$s' Please contact study administration. Thank you. "
This phone is paired with a wearable device
This phone is not paired with a suitable wearable yet.
The last sync with sensor was more than %1$d hours ago.
No data have been received from the sensor yet.
Please bring your phone and the wearable sensor close together and make sure it is switched on.\n If the device does not appear in the list below after one minute, it might need to be recharged.
To connect a new sensor device, you first need to unpair the wearable device, which is currently paired.\n\nPress the UNPAIR DEVICE button to unpair the following device:
Synchronization with Sensor Device failed! Reason: %1$s
Pairing error: \'%1$s\' Please contact study administration.
Please enter the number you see on the wearable\'s display.

It is recommended to reset the device before using it with StudyCompanion app.

This will reset all data stored on the wearable device to their factory defaults.

Do you want to reset the device?
Please wait while downloading data from wearable…
"All recorded data, which were not synchronized with this phone, will be lost and you have to pair the device to continue using it. Are you sure to forget the current device '%1$s' ? "
You have no permission to see any of the fields in this form.
Error at parsing form field data.
Error on building the resulting data set. Please contact study administrator.
Lists with element type "ADT" are currently not supported yet.
Invalid data format. Please contact study administration.
Invalid list schema. Please contact study administration.
Invalid server response during data synchronization: %1$s
"Server communication problem during data synchronization. StatusCode: %1$d, message: %2$s"
Please recharge your sensor device soon.
The data collected with this app will be sent to f4f server at TH Wildau in regular periods of time. This needs an internet connection via WiFi.
Today\'s questions have not been answered yet.
Browse or edit the daily questions you already answered or add information for the past days afterwards.

Are you sure to disconnect this App from f4f backend service? You need your personalized credentials (username/password) or an QR code to connect to f4f services again.\n\nPlease only proceed if the study administration asked you to do so.
Last time data was sent to server was at: %1$s
Last time data was sent to server was more than %1$d hours ago!

In the following system dialogs you will be asked to gain various system permissions, which allow f4f StudyCompanion to access different features of your smartphone. Gaining All these permissions is required for the app to properly fulfill its task. Android requires to gain permission to access the phone\'s geolocation for being able to communicate with Bluetooth devices like your wearable sensor. Gaining this permission is only required and used for this purpose. Your actual geolocation will not be tracked! Thank you for your cooperation.
Please gain all of the requested App permissions.\nWithout gaining access to these permissions, f4f StudyCompanion cannot be used.
Please choose \"ALWAYS ALLOW\" in the following dialog to enable the App to communicate with the wearable sensors in background.
An error occurred when trying to prepare firmware update: %1$s
Firmware update will be installed on device on next sensor synchronization.
No firmware update available for connected sensor device.
A new version of the device firmware is available. Do you want to update on next sensor synchronization?
Searching for available sensor firmware update…
The following list shows an overview of the study-relevant foods you consumed today.\nPlease add new entries by Pressing the green button.\nYou can remove existing entries by pressing the red button.
Add a new meal you ate today…
Please enter the amount of pieces.
Please specify the consumed amount in grams.
Please specify the consumed amount in milliliters.
No entries found! Please contact study administration.
Please scan the QR code\nto personalize your app with f4f profile.
Please scan the barcode\nof the product you consumed.
Error during synchronization.\nPlease check your internet connection.
Notify about ongoing synchronizations with server or sensors.
Reminders for answering daily questions or other usage advices
Not connected to sensor.\nPlease make sure, wearable device is switched on, charged and physically close to this phone.

Please wear the Cosinuss° One In-Ear-Clip at least for %1$d minutes every day between %2$s and %3$s.\nWhile wearing the wearable please ensure, it is charged, turned on and properly connected with the phone.

The signal quality of the cosinuss° One is not yet optimal. Please wait a moment for the adjustment process… When the progress bar does not turn green, please try to manually adjust the earpiece or re-plug it into your ear.
Low battery level (%1$d %%).\nPlease charge the device!
Bluetooth is disabled. Please enable Bluetooth on your device.
Cannot start synchronization with server. You are not logged in as a participant.

Currently you are not connected to the internet via a WiFi network. If you are connected via a mobile network, we can use this connection for sending the collected sensor data to the f4f server. This might affect your monthly data transfer volume. \\Do you allow to send data to f4f server using your mobile internet connection for this single time?

This smartphone is currently not connected to the internet.
\Synchronization with f4f server requires an active internet connection.

Please make sure, the smartphone is connected to the internet through a WiFi network.

Do you want to reset the user's password?

If yes, the user will see the randomly generated new password in the mail text.

If no, the user will keep the current password, which will not be displayed to the user.
Please enter the email address, which the registration mail should be send to. \nThis address is only used once and will not be saved.
We\'d like to ask you to answer some daily questions regarding your well-being and your consumed food.
You have not answered all of today\'s questions yet.
Select the participant to modify, delete or show QR code.
Tap \'Create\' to add a new participant to the database.
Please ask the participant to open the StudyCompanion app and select \"Show QR\" from the main menu.\nAlternatively you can scan the participant\'s HSZ identifier.
The scanned QR code does not belong to any known participant!
Successfully scanned QR code for user\n\'%1$s\'.
Unexpected error on initializing Garmin SDK.\nPlease restart your smartphone.\n If this error persists, please contact Study Administration
Unable to receive a valid Garmin license. Authorized f4f backend communication is required at least one time before communication with Garmin devices is possible.
The scanned code contains invalid data. Please try again.
Please connect the cosinuss° One sensor
After %1$s no active cosinuss° One in-ear sensor could be recognized today. \nPlease turn on the device and leave it plugged in your ear for at least %2$d minutes. \nThank you.
We have a question for you
You have not yet answered today\'s daily questions yet. \nPlease tap here to open the daily questions form. \nThank you for your support.
Thank you for putting on the in-ear sensor.
You have reached the time required for data collection to wear the cosine sensor for today. You can now remove and turn off the sensor.
A new version of the f4f StudyCompanion is available and should be installed.\nPlease tap here to open f4f StudyCompanion.
This generated QR code can be used both for downloading the f4f StudyCompanion App as well as for connecting the installed app to f4f backend.
You do not have the permission to edit this data set.
You need an internet connection for editing your profile. Please make sure this smartphone is connected to a valid mobile or WiFi network.
The f4f server responded with invalid data. Please contact the study administration, if this error persists. We apologize the inconvenience.
An error occurred. Your changes could not be saved. Please try again another time.
Please specify or update the details about your general health state in the following form.
There is no valid study period specified for the current participant profile.
You have not yet added any meals today.
No installable App package found. If this error persists, please contact study administration.

"Please gain permission for installation of Apps from unknown sources to allow the f4f Study Companion to install its latest app version. To do this we'd ask you do declare that you trust this source in the upcoming dialog. Thank you! "
Granting the permission is necessary for installing the Update. Not installing the update might negatively affect the quality of the data acquisition. Please click on \"Install Update\" to try again.
A new version of the f4f StudyCompanion App was automatically downloaded and is ready to be installed.
The f4f StudyCompanion is not up to date.
Thank you very much for Updating the f4f StudyCompanion App!
The study period has not started yet.
THANK YOU VERY MUCH!\nYou\'ve completed the study.

Software License Agreement
for Garmin Health Standard SDK

 

BY USING THE DEVICE, YOU AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE FOLLOWING SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT. PLEASE READ THIS AGREEMENT CAREFULLY.

 

Garmin Ltd. and its subsidiaries (“Garmin”) grant you a limited license to use the software embedded in this device (the “Software”) in binary executable form in the normal operation of the product. Title, ownership rights, and intellectual property rights in and to the Software remain in Garmin and/or its third-party providers.

 

You acknowledge that the Software is the property of Garmin and/or its third-party providers and is protected under the United States of America copyright laws and international copyright treaties. You further acknowledge that the structure, organization, and code of the Software, for which source code is not provided, are valuable trade secrets of Garmin and/or its third-party providers and that the Software in source code form remains a valuable trade secret of Garmin and/or its third-party providers. You agree not to decompile, disassemble, modify, reverse assemble, reverse engineer, or reduce to human readable form the Software or any part thereof or create any derivative works based on the Software. You agree not to export or re-export the Software to any country in violation of the export control laws of the United States of America or the export control laws of any other applicable country.
Invalid data schema. Please contact study administration.
Please present this QR code to the study assistant when you visit the Human Study Center.
I did not consume any of the selectable food products today.
"Error on updating user on server: Communication Problem. "
Error: A participant with this username already exists.
No person found with the specified username.
Copyright © 2020 - %1$d\nTechnical University of Applied Sciences Wildau\nTelematics Research Group
Please enter this PIN when you are asked for during the pairing process:
Please Press OK to continue the pairing process.
